landing_hero_subtitle: Streamline your mosque operations with a powerful, multi-tenant platform designed for administrators, staff, and volunteers.
landing_features_title: Everything You Need to Manage Your Mosque
landing_features_subtitle: Powerful features designed to simplify operations and enhance community engagement
landing_feature_contacts_description: Organize and manage all your community contacts in one centralized system with advanced search and filtering capabilities.
landing_feature_activities_description: Create, schedule, and track activities with detailed session management and real-time updates for teachers and volunteers.
landing_feature_attendance_description: Monitor attendance patterns, generate reports, and gain insights into community participation with comprehensive analytics.
landing_feature_organizations_descriptio: Manage multiple organizations with Stripe subscription integration, billing, and administrative controls.
landing_feature_teams_description: Organize your staff and volunteers into teams with role-based access control and permission management.
landing_feature_multi_tenant_description: Seamlessly manage multiple mosque organizations from a single platform with complete data isolation and security.
landing_cta_title: Ready to Transform Your Mosque Management?
landing_cta_description: Join mosques around the world using Moskent to streamline their operations and better serve their communities.
org_setup_wizard_description: Follow these steps to create your organization and get started
org_setup_step_basic_info_description: Enter your organization's name and choose a unique slug
org_setup_step_team_description: Create an initial team for your organization
org_setup_step_complete_description: Your organization has been successfully created

org_setup_validation_slug_invalid_format: Slug can only contain lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens
